thread.title: Roy Hodgson revels in England's perfect 10 - Wandsworth Guardian
thread.title_full: Roy Hodgson revels in England's perfect 10 - Wandsworth Guardian - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Wandsworth Guardian
title: Roy Hodgson revels in England's perfect 10 - Wandsworth Guardian
text:
Roy Hodgson insists he never doubted his players were capable of winning all 10 of their Euro 2016 qualifying matches. Ross Barkley and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain found the net while Giedrius Arlauskis scored an own goal in the straightforward win at the LFF Stadium.
 Wandsworth Guardian.
